name: Spring & Fall
description:
Do you like to go fast? Like, really fast?

Use your command over fast-growing vegetation to catapult yourself to insane heights in this first-person action platformer inspired by speedrunning strategies. Build up momentum, shoot the targets, and finish the course as quickly as you can.

Achieve mechanical and botanical perfection.

Controls
  • W,A,S,D to move
  • LMB to shoot
  • RMB to spawn plants
  • ESC to pause
Credits / About

Created by me (@DillonSteyl) in one week for the GoGodot game jam. 

Art Assets: kenney.nl
Sound effects (only free sound effects used): https://www.pmsfx.com/
